justification: “The bispectral index (BIS) is commonly used as a measure of anaesthetic depth during a procedure.”
“Lempel-Ziv complexity (LZC)… could become a more promising index than the BIS for reliably tracking consciousness.”
“…and perturbation complexity measuring entropy could become a more promising index than the BIS for reliably tracking consciousness.”
“P300… will be accepted that P300 is an index of explicit cognition.”
“slow oscillatory activity… suppress ERP responses… subconscious potentials, respectively e.g. … N100.”
“Alpha spindles are a classic signature of adequate depth of anaesthesia and unconsciousness during both intravenous anaesthetics such as propofol and volatile gases.”
construct: adequate depth of anaesthesia and unconsciousness
